TopicTitle: I can’t find advanced tweekables (playing on Xbox)

Articles.Content: I just found out about this after getting back into this game after a couple years. I am playing on an Xbox 1, and I can’t find advanced tweekables in the menu settings anywhere? Have they taken them out or can console not support them?

It's still there just checked. Press start after beginning/loading a game, then click settings and its the fifth one up from the bottom.

Edited April 25, 2021 by Chryssalid 8492
